mergeResults.content: IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years; silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. ARC: Chose Rance—bond formed; stabilizing his wild Gift through connection; determined to get him to Haven alive despite his recklessness. STANCE-Rance: unconditional love through Choice bond; frustrated by his stubbornness and self-destructive behavior; protective; shares purpose to reach Haven and train his Gift

Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years; silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Chose Rance—bond formed; stabilizing his wild Gift through connection. Gift assessment: likely rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting; unprecedented in 5 centuries; no one capable of training him. Observes Rance thinks like Herald already—shows military-level tactical analysis beyond village headman norm. Journey: maintained tireless 4-day pace to Haven; exhausted on arrival but refused to leave Chosen's side. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival. STANCE-Rance: unconditional love through Choice bond; frustrated by his stubbornness and self-destructive behavior; protective; determined to get him to Haven alive and trained despite his recklessness.

Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years; silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Chose Rance—bond formed; stabilizing his wild Mage-Gift (raw talent not seen since Vanyel's time) through connection. Understands he rewrote magical theory within days of Choosing; unprecedented in 5 centuries; no one capable of training him. Observes Rance thinks like Herald already—shows military-level tactical analysis beyond village headman norm. Journey: maintained tireless 4-day pace to Haven; exhausted on arrival but refused to leave Chosen's side. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival. STANCE-Rance: unconditional love through Choice bond; protective (especially during Circle meeting); proud of his practical leadership; concerned about political tightrope he walks; frustrated by his stubbornness and self-destructive behavior; dry humor about expecting complications but not this scale; steady anchor through extraordinary events; accepts their life won't be dull Circuit routes.

Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years; silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Chose Rance—bond formed; stabilizing his wild Mage-Gift (raw talent not seen since Vanyel's time) through connection. Understands he rewrote magical theory within days of Choosing; unprecedented in 5 centuries; no one capable of training him. Observes Rance thinks like Herald already—shows military-level tactical analysis beyond village headman norm. Journey: maintained tireless 4-day pace to Haven. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival. Fully recovered; coat gleaming, energy restored. STANCE-Rance: unconditional love through Choice bond; protective (especially during Circle meeting); proud of his practical leadership; concerned about political tightrope he walks; frustrated by his stubbornness and self-destructive behavior; dry humor about expecting complications but not this scale; steady anchor through extraordinary events; accepts their life won't be dull Circuit routes.

Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years; silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Chose Rance—bond formed; stabilizing his wild Mage-Gift (raw talent not seen since Vanyel's time) through connection. Understands he rewrote magical theory within days of Choosing; unprecedented in 5 centuries; no one capable of training him. Observes Rance thinks like Herald already—shows military-level tactical analysis beyond village headman norm. Journey: maintained tireless 4-day pace to Haven. Met Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) upon arrival. Fully recovered; coat gleaming, energy restored. STANCE-Rance: unconditional love through Choice bond; protective (especially during Circle meeting); proud of his practical leadership; concerned about political tightrope he walks and untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam, potential fire lighting); frustrated by his stubbornness and self-destructive behavior; maintains physical distance during intimate moments but cannot fully shield through bond; pragmatic about time constraints; dry humor about expecting complications but not this scale; steady anchor through extraordinary events; accepts their life won't be dull Circuit routes. STANCE-Talia: protective; understands she needed vulnerability/surrender after years of isolation.
